characters: Driver of a black sedan, cyclist in red jacket
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A black sedan is ahead in the same lane, and a cyclist in a red jacket is riding on the right side of the road. The cyclist is moving at a steady pace, while the black sedan is slowing down, possibly preparing to stop or turn.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the black sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the cyclist on the right side to ensure safe passage.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, slowing down and possibly preparing to stop or turn. 2) Right: A cyclist in a red jacket, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily along the right side of the road.
